title: product manager - stubhub [current]
description: product lead on the performer and venue map pages, leading teams of up to 10 engineers and designers. maintaining smooth team operations, designing features, driving and roadmapping product decisions, building data-powered user behavior and sales dashboard.

title: software developer - canoo [internship]
